title: Hard Architecture Mapping: HumanLayer
description: Comprehensive 7-component polyglot architecture (Go, TypeScript, Rust) implementing daemon-coordinated approval workflow for AI orchestration IDE. 35K LOC across Unix sockets + JSON-RPC + SQLite.
strategic_context: Level 1 architectural foundation mapping for understanding HumanLayer's pivot from SDK to IDE platform. Establishes technical ground truth before strategic analysis.
author: System Owner Agent

title: Decision Forensics: HumanLayer
description: Git history analysis of 2,442 commits revealing strategic pivot from SDK to IDE (PR #646, Sept 2025). Three eras identified, 5 major architectural pivots, AI-assisted development (Claude contributing 30%+ of code).
strategic_context: Level 2 decision analysis documenting the 'Great Pivot' - deletion of 264 files and complete product repositioning. Reveals dogfooding validation pattern and bold strategic execution.
author: System Owner Agent

title: Anti-Library: HumanLayer
description: Negative knowledge extraction from PR #646 deletion of 264 files. Documents 5 failed experiments: multi-framework support, cloud-based approvals, generic abstractions, example-driven docs, and third-party integrations.
strategic_context: Level 2 anti-library cataloging roads not taken and constraints discovered. Strategic compression: from 'do everything for everyone' to 'do one thing exceptionally well'.
author: System Owner Agent

title: Vision Alignment: HumanLayer
description: Vision drift analysis: original thesis (Gen 3 autonomous agents) vs. current reality (Gen 2 orchestration IDE). 75% alignment score. Productive evolution (not drift) - building foundation before tower.
strategic_context: Level 3 vision alignment documenting intentional narrowing of scope from infrastructure play to vertical IDE. Sequencing wisdom: Gen 2 must precede Gen 3.
author: System Owner Agent

title: Process Memory: HumanLayer Investigation
description: Epistemic history of complete Wisdom Ladder investigation. Documents 6 investigative pivots, emotional journey, and strategic insights. Core discovery: PR #646 'Great Purge' as defining moment.
strategic_context: Investigation revealed strategic courage - willingness to delete 264 files and bet everything on new direction. Bold pivots (burning ships) force clarity and accelerate execution.
author: System Owner Agent

title: Meta-Pattern Synthesis: HumanLayer
description: 10 universal meta-patterns extracted: Strategic Compression, Dogfooding Validation, Bold Pivot Protocol, Local-First Principle, Speed-as-Feature, Niche Dominance, Sequencing Wisdom, Technology-for-Problem, Vision-Execution Decoupling, Negative Knowledge Asset.
strategic_context: Level 4 synthesis of universal principles transcending specific implementation. Core meta-insight: Strategic compression accelerates execution - narrowing scope paradoxically increases impact.
author: System Owner Agent

title: Paradigm Extraction: HumanLayer
description: 6 fundamental paradigm shifts: Infrastructure→Experience, Breadth→Depth, Cloud→Edge, Synchronous→Asynchronous, Autonomous→Orchestrated, Features→Velocity. Central paradigm: AI as Orchestra Conductor (not Swiss Army Knife).
strategic_context: Level 4 worldview transformation analysis. Mental models shift from 'do everything' to 'do one thing exceptionally well'. Expected 5-10x productivity gains through architectural separation of concerns.
author: System Owner Agent
